text: Bridge to Terabithia is a novel by Katherine Paterson. ==Summary== Bridge to Terabithia is about two children who create a fictional kingdom in a forest. The two main characters are Leslie Burke and Jess Aarons.Bridge to Terabithia ; retrieved 2012-2-25. The author thought of writing this book after her son David L. Paterson's friend Lisa Hill died from being struck by lightning in 1974. ==Honors== In 1978, the book won the Newbery Medal. "Opinion: What Have Other People Thought About Bridge to Terabithia?"; retrieved 2012-2-25. The work was also awarded an ALA Notable Children's Book, which is given to the best children's books of the year. ==Related pages== *Bridge to Terabithia (2007 movie) ==References== Category:American children's books Category:1977 books Category:American fantasy books Category:Newbery Medal winning books
